content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Yeah, I need a plumber for a leaking pipe in my basement.
I'm sorry to hear about the leak. May I have your name so I can get your information started?
Thank you, Mike. Could you please provide your address so we can confirm if you're within our service area?
Thanks! You are within our service area. When would be a good time for our plumber to visit?
Actually, before I book, I want to check around and get quotes from some other companies first.
No problem, Mike. If you have any questions or when you're ready to schedule, please let us know! We're here to help when you need us.
reason: Customer declined to schedule to get quotes from other companies.
